pages.text: It is unknown what this place truly is. Sanctuary? Hell? Universe's fate? One can only guess. But only one thing can be said for certain... It is horrifying and eldritch. It is a place where time doesn't exist, and laws of physics bend to the ever-increasing entropy. The Verge of Reality resembles an infinite wasteland stretching under a wicked, bloody-red sky, and comprised of ash both on the ground and
in the air, making it hard to breathe. The Verge has a variety of structures, varying from simple scraps to whole dungeons containing even more mysteries, waiting for someone to discover them...
